tooltip.lazierae2.aggregator.description: Facilitates in-world crafting by combining Crystal Growth Accelerators. Grants access to Crystal Crafts by using raw materials and has charging capabilities.
tooltip.lazierae2.etcher.description: Essentially an Advanced Inscriber but upgradable and faster by making use of raw materials.
tooltip.lazierae2.grinder.description: Grinds resources into their component parts for further use.
tooltip.lazierae2.requester.description: Keeps track of up to 6 different item types and requests new crafts when needed. Needs to be connected to an ME network.
tooltip.lazierae2.progress.title: Recipe Information
tooltip.lazierae2.progress.none: There is no recipe being processed!
tooltip.lazierae2.energy.title: Energy Information
tooltip.lazierae2.dump.title: Dump Energy
tooltip.lazierae2.dump.description: This will void the currently stored energy completely.
tooltip.lazierae2.dump.warning: You will not be able to recover the energy once removed!
tooltip.lazierae2.extract.title: Auto Extract
tooltip.lazierae2.extract.description: Defines if the items from the output slot are automatically transferred to adjacent inventories.
tooltip.lazierae2.io.title: I/O Configuration
tooltip.lazierae2.io.description: Can be used to configure sides that act as inputs and outputs.
tooltip.lazierae2.upgrade.title: Processor Upgrades
tooltip.lazierae2.upgrade.description: Allows you to upgrade the processor's speed and energy storage at the cost of a higher energy consumption. To install upgrades, place Acceleration Cards in this slot.
tooltip.lazierae2.item.side_config: > Processor has a side configuration stored
tooltip.lazierae2.count.title: Request Count
tooltip.lazierae2.count.description: The count defines how many items should be held in stock before the Requester starts requesting new crafts.
tooltip.lazierae2.batch.title: Request Batch
tooltip.lazierae2.batch.description: When craft requests are emitted, the Requester will use the batch size for the request. Using larger batches will increase the speed of stocking up items but will require more crafting storage.
tooltip.lazierae2.status.title: Request Status
tooltip.lazierae2.status.idle: The Requester is idling when the requested amount is already reached, there is no crafting pattern for this item or if there are not enough ingredients to request more crafts.
tooltip.lazierae2.status.link: The system is currently crafting the requested item.
tooltip.lazierae2.status.export: The Requester is trying to export the crafting results to the system. If the Requester has this status for a long time, there is no available space for the export.
